a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Foreign aid given for emergencies and longer-term development, per

Committed bilateral
official development assistance (ODA)
, divided by population. Aid for emergencies, such as natural
disasters and wars, is often called humanitarian aid. This data is expressed in US dollars and adjusted for inflation.
Data source: OECD (2025); Population based on various sources (2024)
Note: This data is expressed in constant 2022 US$.
